text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump I refuse to listen to your daily LIES.  You are deranged.  This is no time to re-open the country.  Here in NJ we are just reaching our peak of Covid-19 cases.  Stop speaking and let the medical experts do so.  More people will die if we re-open too early, not that you'd care.
